reuze

Class ib_FilterCaustics

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • reuze.ib_a_FilterWholeImage
        • reuze.ib_FilterCaustics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp, java.io.Serializable

    public class ib_FilterCaustics
extends ib_a_FilterWholeImage
    A filter which simulates underwater caustics. This can be animated to get a bottom-of-the-swimming-pool effect.
    See Also:
